description: The EC2 API DescribeInstances call should return the IP addresses _and_ the DNS names.  We are only populating the DNS names (with the IP addresses), and we should populate the 2 IP address elements also - privateIpAddress and ipAddress.
title: EC2 API: DescribeInstances should return privateIpAddress and publicIpAddress, not just DNS names
